name: Manager of Time
description:
Admit it: you always wished you could rewind time. But wait no more, as in this short game, you get to control time itself! (Albeit just to make it to a meeting on time...)

Platformer where you can control the time of your surroundings. This is our first time in Unity so its just a very rough prototype level.

Controls: 
Move - Left/Right
Rewind - C
TimeStop - V
FastForward - B (not functional)

Credits:
Karlis Valdmanis - Sprites, Animations, Logo
Jonas Hilla - Sound, Backgrounds
Stefan Schmidt - Programming
